entry.title: Hello [to a Whole New] World!
entry.content: Hello, internet! I mean, world! Welcome to my website/blog! I’ve decided to start using octopress for this site so as to save myself lots of time in desiging a website by hand. However, I will certainly still be making numerous changes to the layout over the next couple (days, months, years…). I hope you enjoy reading all about my fun adventures into the infinitely fascinating world of technology!
